text.key: Please choose a function to perform
text.translation: Please choose a function to perform
Vælg venligst en funktion at udføre

text.key: Please select one or more subdocuments for batch operation
text.translation: Please select one or more subdocuments for batch operation
Vælg venligst et eller flere underdokumenter

text.key: HTML::Diff is missing from the server. Version comparison is not available.
text.translation: HTML::Diff is missing from the server. Version comparison is not available.
HTML::Diff findes ikke på serveren. Sammenligning af versioner kan ikke foretages.

text.key: No version to compare with specified.
text.translation: No version to compare with specified.
Der er ikke angivet nogen version at sammenligne med.

text.key: Component not found for document type
text.translation: Component not found for document type

text.key: Instead of deleting the document, you may want to
text.translation: Instead of deleting the document, you may want to
I stedet for at slette dokumentet kan du overveje at

text.key: Please remember that if you delete the document, all versions will be deleted, and it can not be recovered
text.translation: Please remember that if you delete the document, all versions will be deleted, and it can not be recovered
Husk at hvis du sletter et dokument, slettes alle versioner af dokumentet og det kan ikke gendannes

text.key: Document names can not contain "/" characters, sorry
text.translation: Document names can not contain "/" characters, sorry
Dokumentets navn kan ikke indeholde tegnet "/", beklager

text.key: Path must start and end with a "/" character
text.translation: Path must start and end with a "/" character
Stien skal have en "/" både først og sidst

text.key: Can not move document under itself
text.translation: Can not move document under itself
Kan ikke flytte dokumentet under sig selv

text.key: You are about to delete this document and all the documents beneath it, in total
text.translation: You are about to delete this document and all the documents beneath it, in total
Du er ved at slette dette dokument og alle dokumenter placeret under det, i alt

text.key: Are you sure you want to delete these
text.translation: Are you sure you want to delete these
Er du sikker på at du vil slette disse

text.key: You are about to copy this document and all the documents beneath it, in total
text.translation: You are about to copy this document and all the documents beneath it, in total
Du er ved at kopiere dette dokument og alle dokumenter placeret under det, i alt

text.key: Are you sure you want to copy these
text.translation: Are you sure you want to copy these
Er du sikker på at du vil kopiere disse
har allerede et underdokument der hedder

text.key: Can not recursively copy a document underneath itself
text.translation: Can not recursively copy a document underneath itself
Kan ikke kopiere et dokument med underdokumenter ned under sig selv

text.key: contains characters that are not allowed, please change the name
text.translation: contains characters that are not allowed, please change the name
indeholder tegn der ikke kan benyttes, ret venligst navnet

text.key: A document already exists with the selected name
text.translation: A document already exists with the selected name
Der findes allerede et dokument med det valgte navn

text.key: Now editing a new document named
text.translation: Now editing a new document named
Redigerer et nyt dokument med navnet

text.key: Usually it is not necessary to flush the cache by hand, as the cache is automatically invalidated at the appropriate times. However, sometimes it is nice to be able to do so anyhow.
text.translation: Usually it is not necessary to flush the cache by hand, as the cache is automatically invalidated at the appropriate times. However, sometimes it is nice to be able to do so anyhow.
Normalt er det ikke nødvendigt at nulstille cachen manuelt, da den automatisk bliver nulstillet, når det er nødvendigt. Det kan dog være rart at have muligheden alligevel.

text.key: You do not have access to this command. Sorry.
text.translation: You do not have access to this command. Sorry.
Du har ikke adgang til denne kommando. Beklager.
Kunne ikke oprette indgang i databasen
Der findes ingen applikation med navnet

text.key: The XHTML in this field will be validated when you save the document
text.translation: The XHTML in this field will be validated when you save the document
XHTML-indholdet i dette felt vil blive checket når du gemmer dokumentet

text.key: could not be added to box
text.translation: could not be added to box

text.key: Can't move top item up, sorry
text.translation: Can't move top item up, sorry
Det øverste dokument kan ikke flyttes op, beklager

text.key: Can't move last item down, sorry
text.translation: Can't move last item down, sorry
Det nederste dokument kan ikke flyttes ned, beklager

text.key: Number of subdocuments on one page
text.translation: Number of subdocuments on one page

text.key: Sort order of sub documents - sort according to
text.translation: Sort order of sub documents - sort according to

text.key: Choose the appropriate keywords for this document
text.translation: Choose the appropriate keywords for this document
Vælg de relevante nøgleord for dette dokument
This linkdocument isn't shown as a document on the public website as such; if you click on it, you will be automatically transferred to
Dette linkdokument ses ikke som et dokument på det offentlige website; hvis man klikker sig ind på det, kommer man automatisk direkte til adressen

text.key: Number of entries in news box
text.translation: Number of entries in news box
Teaser (if this field is filled out, the text will replace the text above the checkboxes)
Resumé (Hvis feltet udfyldes erstatter denne tekst teksten over checkboksene)

text.key: The template used send subscription passwords
text.translation: The template used send subscription passwords (e.g. mail/subscribe_passwd)
Skabelon til udsendelse af kodeord (eks.: mail/subscribe_passwd)
Inkludér i abonnement ved automatisk offentliggørelse
Tekst der vises ved vellykket oprettelse
Der er ikke oprettet nogen nøgleord endnu

text.key: Choose the appropriate keywords for this document
text.translation: Choose the appropriate keywords for this document
Vælg de nøgleord der passer på dette dokument
version of this document has not yet been created
version af dette dokument er endnu ikke blevet oprettet
Click here to create the first missing part
Klik her for at oprette den første manglende del
version of this document has not yet been created
version af dette dokument er endnu ikke oprettet
Klik her for at oprette den
Click here to go to the
Klik her for at gå til den

text.key: Doctypes marked with (*) are normally resticted in this area, but are visible to users with admin-rights.
text.translation: Doctypes marked with (*) are normally resticted in this area, but are visible to users with admin-rights.
Dokumenttyper markeret med (*) er normalt begrænset i dette område, men er synlige for brugere med admin-rettighed.
